metadata.title: CVE-2021-44496 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to theYottaDB code base). Using crafted input, an attacker can control the sizevariable and buffer that is passed to a call to memcpy. An attacker can usethis to overwrite key data structures and gain control of the flow ofexecution.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
